src:
Riksbanken splittrad om räntehöjningen
Riksbankens balansgång mellan en räntehöjning och duvaktiga signaler tydliggörs i protokollet från det senaste räntemötet som publicerades på tisdagen.  Även om en höjning fortfarande sannolikt blir av i december uttrycker flera ledamöter skepsis mot den nuvarande räntebanan.
05 Nov 2019, 11:19 by Felicia Åkerman

text:
The Riksbank split on the interest rate hike
The Riksbank's balance between a rate hike and dovish signals is made clear in the minutes of the last interest rate meeting published on Tuesday. Although an increase is still likely to be completed in December, several members express skepticism about the current interest rate path.
05 Nov 2019, 11:19 by Felicia Åkerman
